Dear Valued Customer, 

 

Please find enclosed your statement of account as of 14/02/2025 , for your review.

 

Kindly review the same and settle the outstanding premium, if due, at the earliest.

 

If the payment has been processed already, please share with us the cheque/payment advise to enable our team to update your account. 

 

A negative account balance may indicate a refund or another issue that requires clarification. Please contact our team promptly to address this issue.
